body:
This wa on old fourms under review so i wanted to see what would happen.

Kit name: TNT runnerGame name: WallsItems: chain helmet and boots, stone sword, 5 TNT blocks which explode on impact but don't do damage to you, map or teammates.
Ability: Every 30 seconds after the walls have dropped you kinda poop out a TNT which blow up after 5 seconds. This effect does no hurt you or teammates neither does it destroy blocks just hurts enemys.How is this unique? This is good for those TNT lovers and good in a tight situation.
Game level for kit: 32 P.S ifthe kit comitte think it needs editing to get accepted just post below thankyou
